subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: After sweeping the Red Sox over the weekend, the Yankees lost to the Blue Jays behind a mediocre effort from starting pitcher Sergio Mitre. The loss ended a seven-game winning streak.
snippet: After sweeping the Red Sox over the weekend, the Yankees lost to the Blue Jays behind a mediocre effort from starting pitcher Sergio Mitre. The loss ended a seven-game winning streak.
